name: Wani Wani Picnic
description:
Banner and Cartridge Art: @mandimandi

Created For 'A Game By Its Cover 2015'.

Cartridge Art created by @mandimandi for Famicase 2015.

Developed by Kyle Nyland.

"Guide Ally the hungry gator to the picnic. If any baddies get in your way, it's ok, just gobble 'em up! But something tells me Ally might get full before she reaches her goal!

お腹空かせたわにの「アリーちゃん」をピクニックまで案内してね。敵は邪魔しようとしても、相手をもぐもぐ食べたら大丈夫だよ。でも、ピクニックまで着く前に、お腹いっぱいになりそうだね… ！"

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • B - Open Mouth
  • P - Pause/Unpause
  • Enter - Start game
  • Escape - Exit
